page.title: 19 Recreation
page.content: There is no public entertainment in {Longhope, MayHill and Huntley,}so people have to make their own. Local clubs and societies exist to provide for toddlers, Playgroup, Youth Club, sports, amateur dramatics and dancing. The{Cubs, Brownies and Scouts}are based at the churches but most other societies meet in the village hall. A very important amenity in{Longhope village is the{Recreation Ground and {Pavilion.}Each year a{Fete}is held on the first Saturday in July to raise money for the village hall and the upkeep of the Rec..This year two girls from our school were{Carnival {Princesses}and an ex-pupil was {Carnival Queen.}There was a competition for Carnival floats and a fancy dress competition.
